item.description:
--- 2 spaces left as of January 21 (maybe 3, if cancellation) ---
Small group, workshop entails transformational breathwork session.
Personal note: I've assisted at Christian's 4-days version of
Soulful Power, a retreat in NJ in October, also with a small group,
and am witnessing amazing changes in those who participated
and in all areas of their lives, from relationships, to fulfillment at work,
to the open doors around them that they are able to see now,
to the most amazing changes happening in their lives. Definitely
profound healing and life-changing experience that lasts, and
many effects of which are permanent. Plus, everything you learn
there you'll be able to extend to those around you. And, I'm also
speaking from personal experience: benefits for myself from
these events were / are huge, in a very short time and on all levels,
physical, psychological, spiritual, clarity and 'can do' approach, and
essentially seeing own life changing in the most amazing ways.
Elena




Soulful Power



When the going gets tough... the tough go within.

Successful, purposeful work. Fulfilling relationships. Satisfying sexual expression. It all comes down to power. The right use of power.

To what degree are you living in your own power at this time?

How do you avoid or sell out on your power?
Where is power leaking in your life?

The Soulful Power workshop provides insights and practical
skills for engaging power in new ways, resulting in deeper levels of personal fulfillment, self-satisfaction and effectiveness in the world.

You will emerge clearer, more established in your personal power, Â·and more resolved to express yourself fully.

* Learn to unleash your power in healthy & authentic ways
* Identify & transcend personal obstacles to power & success
* Experience more mastery in your life
* Express yourself with more graceful authority in relationships
* Rest, re-energize & rejuvenate while transforming your life
* Find deeper levels of personal fulfillment & self-satisfaction
* Discover differences between soulful and egoic power

Workshop will be held in Watertown Healing Center, 22 Mt. Auburn St, Watertown Sq.
12:30-7:30 PM, Saturday, January 24. RSVP: 617-388-7565 or info@soulfulpower.us
Check details at http://soulfulpower.u...
item.name: One-day Soulful Power Workshop
